title: Gravi v1.0 [PD]
description:
Gravi is an intense puzzle-platformer that will test your tolerance for pain. 

Shoot and swing your way towards victory as Gravi, an adorable blue ball of energy. While youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re launching through terrorizing traps and bending gravity to your will, Anti-Gravi, an atomic ball of rage, is barreling down on your position.Ã¢â‚¬â€¹
Ã¢â‚¬â€¹
After losing yourself in the ridiculously trap-filled underbelly of an alien test facility, you must use your wits and perseverance to solve a series of perplexing puzzles. Along the way, your limits will be put to the test by all sorts of absurdly dangerous hazards.

Snatch up collectibles and fight off Anti-Gravi on your path to freedom. If you can survive GraviÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s 40 unique levels and best Anti-Gravi at his own game, you just might make it out alive.

What's New:

We are consistently improving Gravi. We know our first release might have a bug or two, and we'll work round the clock to get those issues resolved asap.
Recent Changes:
Added New Touch UI Tutorials for Gravi
Added Moga Support for Power A gamepad.
Fixed Glitched Death animations.
